paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted two pathogenic variants in the BRCA2 gene, including detailed penetrance data and individual records of carriers.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Bilateral breast cancer, infiltrating ductal carcinoma, SBRIII
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 36 years old patient (BC17) consulted for a mass in the right breast.
These mutations were also confirmed in a relative of the patient diagnosed with pregnancy associated breast cancer at 25 years old (BC17-2).
Interestingly, 7 additional individuals belonging to 4 Tunisian families were identified as carriers of both mutations (BC6, BC39, BC95, and BC225).
Interestingly, 7 additional individuals belonging to 4 Tunisian families were identified as carriers of both mutations (BC6, BC39, BC95, and BC225).
Interestingly, 7 additional individuals belonging to 4 Tunisian families were identified as carriers of both mutations (BC6, BC39, BC95, and BC225).
Interestingly, 7 additional individuals belonging to 4 Tunisian families were identified as carriers of both mutations (BC6, BC39, BC95, and BC225).

functional_data.summary: The c.632-1G>A mutation is located at the splicing donor site of exon 8 of BRCA2.

variants.segregation_data: Both mutations are found on the same allele.
variants.additional_notes: Cis double heterozygosity associated with severe phenotype and early age of onset.
key_quotes: The identification of unusual BRCA genotypes in this Tunisian cohort highlights the importance of performing genetic studies in under-investigated populations.
The Cis DH BRCA2 genotype seems to be associated with a significant early age of onset (mean age = 35.33 years).

functional_data.summary: The c.1310_1313DelAAGA mutation is a frameshift mutation in exon 10 of BRCA2.
